phrases: First, I would like to say, thank you!
Well that was sudden.
Me too!
Thank you!
To everyone who is watching this...
It is all thanks to the warm breeze of love that you have sent us!
Thank you!
Thank you!
We are really grateful.
It is a wonderful miracle, is not it?
No kind of-sappy lines allowed!
Huh?
No kind of-sappy lines allowed!
Huh?
Dear Ai, yesterday's rain has finally let up, and the weather is very pleasant today.
But Alicia will be out all day, so the shop is closed.
Not only that, but Aika has work and Alice is at school.
So, President Aria and I are going out, too!
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
Aoi hizashi abite
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
I want to spend my days waving to you Itsumademo te o furitai hibi
This is my proof that I was here with you Koko ni tashika ni kimi to ita akashi
An eternal spiral Zutto supiraare
There is a path which stretches on ahead Kono saki mo tsuzuiteru michi ga aru
When you climb the next hill, Tsugi no saka o nobottara
Let us meet again Mata aimashou
That Little Secret Place...
This is a completely residential area, so there is usually no reason to come here when giving tours.
But it is definitely another face of Neo-Venezia.
The scenery here never seems to change.
The rain finally let up yesterday, so I think we have a good chance.
Ready, President Aria?
Ready, set!
Ta-daa!
It is full of laundry, just like we thought!
There is even more over here!
The laundry is blissfully swimming in the sky.
Hey!
You dirtied your clothes already?
But... there was a puddle!
And I just finished doing the laundry, too.
Honestly...
But that Sylph guy said it is good for me to have so much energy!
Honestly...
But that Sylph guy said it is good for me to have so much energy!
But that Sylph guy said it is good for me to have so much energy!
You have too much energy!
For goodness' sake...
You have too much energy!
For goodness' sake...
Huh?
We can see the Campanile from here too, cannot we, President Aria?
President Aria?
President Aria...
Here you go.
This scenery has not changed either, from the time I first came to this city.
We are getting a little hungry, are not we?
Well then, shall we go have lunch?
Ah, I know!
Why do not we go eat that?
You know, that exciting, heart-pounding dish we had the other day at a restaurant near here.
Let us go, shall we?
Well then, off we go!
So, two orders then?
Yes.
Certainly.
Please wait just a moment.
Exciting, exciting.
Thank you for waiting.
Well?
Is not it neat?
I have always loved getting this restaurant's polenta served up like a volcano, ever since I was a kid.
I can really sense the history behind it.
Time to eat.
Let us order that the next time we come here.
Thank you for waiting.
It is here!
Here is your chitarra.
Exciting, exciting.
Exciting, exciting.
Exciting, exciting.
All right, go ahead.
Okay!
It is so much fun!
Yes, yes.
Go ahead.
It looks delicious, does not it?
That was delicious, was not it?
President Aria...
President Aria!
We are so stuffed, are not we, President Aria?
Ah, I am starving.
Maybe I will get some pizza...
Huh?
Is not that Sideburns?
Just as I was hoping I would run into Alicia on my day off, too.
Geez, she just does not get it, does she?
Oh well, maybe I will go yank on her sideburns as a greeting anyway.
Why do not we try going this way?
Huh?
She is gone.
Which way did she go?
Where is she?
Where is she, where is she?
Where is she, where is she, where is she?
Where is she, where is she, where is she, where is she, where is she, where is she?!
I guess I lost her.
Madam, give me a slice of tomato pizza.
Sure.
Thank you for your business.
There she is!
They have some new outfits, President Aria!
What is she doing?
Akatsukin!
Huh?
Are you off today?
Yeah.
Are you going to our middle school reunion, Akatsukin?
Yeah.
Then I will send the RSVPs for both of us.
Yeah.
That pizza sure looks good.
Are you sure?
Yeah.
Thanks!
She went inside.
See ya.
Yeah.
See ya.
Yeah.
Huh?
My pizza...
Where did it go?
It looks great on you.
I am happy for you, President Aria.
Caffe Florian's restoration has begun, President Aria.
I am sure it will be more radiant than ever when it is reborn.
I lost her again.
Stupid fast girl!
She is elusive, that is for sure.
Huh?
It will not open.
This entrance is off limits to the public.
Please use the elevator like everyone else.
What?
But I-
It cannot be helped!
Thank you so much.
Not at all.
Come again anytime.
Ah, and please send Alicia my regards.
I will!
This is taking forever!
What?!
How in the world did she...
You are not getting away this time!
Prepare yourself to be caught!
Huh?
Pony-boy?
I wonder what he is doing.
He is really acting sneaky, is not he?
Junior.
I wonder where he is headed?
Who knows.
Want to go see?
Yes!
We have not been here for a while, have we?
It is a tourist attraction, so there are lots of people nearby.
But strangely, no one ever notices this spot.
Not Aika, not Alice...
I bet not even Alicia knows about it.
It is my very own place.
If I stay here like this, no one can find me.
President Aria, the city of Neo-Venezia is changing little by little, is not it?
It is not here!
I cannot find the stairway anywhere!
Where is it?!
Just how did she get up there?
Could that be it?
Is it all right to enter without permission?
Eh, whatever.
Oh, wow!
You can see the entire inside stretch of the basilica from here.
Horse butts...
She is sleeping...
BIG-DOUBLE-SIDEBURN-YANK!!
That will teach you, Sideburns!
Akatsuki, an ambush is not fair.
I have finally caught you.
Caught me?
Come to think of it, why did I have to follow Sideburns in the first place?
No, I absolutely was not following you!
At any rate, I am amazed you managed to find your way up here.
The stairs leading up here are inconspicuous, so most people do not even notice them.
it was a piece a cake.
So, what brings you to this place?
The truth is, there is someone here that I am interested in.
So every once in a while, I secretly come here to see him.
You see this person in secret?
Yes.
You see this person in secret?
Yes.
Just the two of you?
Yes.
Just the two of you?
Yes.
Ah, but President Aria is with us, too.
He always gazes out to sea from here, all alone.
Sideburns, just who is this guy?
Huh?
I am asking you who he is!
It is this person right here.
But anyway, come here Akatsuki, come here.
Huh?
What is it?
But anyway, come here Akatsuki, come here.
Huh?
What is it?
If you crouch here, you can see the world from his point of view.
See?
A white seabird with a tilted neck...
Kubi o kashigeta shiroi umidori
Soon, a ship sailing beyond the sky...
Sora no mukou no fune ga mousugu
Soon, a ship sailing beyond the sky...
Sora no mukou no fune ga mousugu Surrounded by this scenery that never changes, happy things, new things, even sad things...

Lively people gathered among colorful glass Nigiwau hito iro toridori no garasuzaiku
It is just like how the shapes of the clouds and the color of the sea are always quietly changing.

Aitai hito tooi kuni e itta
The person I long to see has gone to a far-off land...
Aitai hito tooi kuni e itta
For hundreds of years, a time so unfathomably long,
The person I long to see has gone to a far-off land...
Aitai hito tooi kuni e itta he has been watching over this piazza, unbeknownst to everyone.
That is why...
Until the bells ring, I shall wait here Kane ga naru made koko de machimashou

Go on, go on.
Uh...
Sorry to interrupt.
We were really just passing by.
Hold it right there!

Stop getting the wrong idea, Gachapen!
You better not tell Alicia anything!
Understand?!
This was supposed to be my secret place...
You better not tell Alicia anything!
Understand?!
I see...
It just became everyone is special place, starting today.

In this city that never changes, little by little, things begin to change.
